name: ListHostedNumbersDependentHostedNumberOrder
description: Retrieve a list of dependent HostedNumberOrders belonging to the AuthorizationDocument.

SigningDocumentSid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the LOA document associated with this HostedNumberOrder.

Status.description: Status of an instance resource. It can hold one of the values: 1. opened 2. signing, 3. signed LOA, 4. canceled, 5. failed. See the section entitled [Status Values](https://www.twilio.com/docs/phone-numbers/hosted-numbers/hosted-numbers-api/authorization-document-resource#status-values) for more information on each of these statuses.

PhoneNumber.description: An E164 formatted phone number hosted by this HostedNumberOrder.

IncomingPhoneNumberSid.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the IncomingPhoneNumber resource created by this HostedNumberOrder.

FriendlyName.description: A human readable description of this resource, up to 64 characters.

UniqueName.description: Provides a unique and addressable name to be assigned to this HostedNumberOrder, assigned by the developer, to be optionally used in addition to SID.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
